attributes.action: expand CE marking to require the country of  origin to be a ratified Kyoto signatory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The control of emissions from countries which are not ratified Kyoto signatories is of great international concern. By restricting access to CE marking to manufacturers within countries which are ratified Kyoto signatories, internal commercial pressure will be exerted on the remaining countries to join. Put simply, countries wishing to export to Europe will need to join Kyoto.
